original_title: Hollywood Confidential: Secret Of Stage Five
overview: Hollywood, 1939... When Hallmark Studios closes for the day, the night shift arrives.  Over on Stage Five, Len Reinhardt is busy working through the night making movies.  Veronica Vain, Hollywood hopeful, has come to Hallmark for what her agent, Bugs Morton, told her was a screentest.  The director, Len Reinhardt, has another idea. He wants her to star in an explicit jungle love story.
title: Hollywood Confidential: Secret Of Stage Five
